dj premier: prhyme adrian younge royce da 59 dj premier. this song here was originally supposed to be done with my man black thought. unfortunately we lost a great man:  mr. richard nichols; r.i.p. to the legendary roots crew hold your head. we all continue on thats how lifes supposed to be and thats how we treat life. so one day riq gave me a call; he said yo that joint you did with common yall wanna do a remix of that by the way shout out to common. congratulations on the oscar my nigga.  john legend big up. word i said yeah yeah when yall wanna do that he said yo ill come over right now. oh yeah well step inside the booth. yo riq its go time. wishin: part ii
